name: Grav (itch) (DeaconBeacon)
description: Project Grav is platformer game, the first game as RISTEK GameDev 2021 member and a submission for #BWJam where the game has to be black and white. This game takes the controls of a regular platformer with a twist that you can control where your gravity direction goes. For now there's not a lot of levels and the game will loop as a choice, but I'll gradually add them in time.
